---
title: "`ramp.control`"
---

[**`ramp.control`**](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.control/) is an R-package available from github. It extends **`ramp.xds`** with algorithms and functions to model the distribution, effects and sizes of various forms of vector control. 

To install the latest version of **`ramp.control`** from GitHub, run the following lines of code in an R session.

```{r, eval=F}
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("dd-harp/ramp.control")
```

**`ramp.control`** depends on [**`ramp.xds`**](ramp.xds.html)
